title: Chapter 4330 - Chapter 4330: 4329 Carefree Boat, The Ancestor Of The Carefree Sect!
body:
Chapter 4330 - Chapter 4330: 4329 Carefree Boat, The Ancestor Of The Carefree Sect!

Chapter 4330: 4329 carefree boat, the ancestor of the carefree sect!

Translator: 549690339

“I’ve found the flaw!”

Wang Xian concealed his figure and disappeared between the heaven and earth!

His concealment technique could be sensed by experts of the same level or even the control level.

However, those experts who had just entered the Heaven’s origin manifestation level could not sense Wang Xian.

They could not sense Wang Xian at all when they saw him disappear.

This made their hearts clench!

Swoosh

Wang Xian’s body flashed and instantly arrived at the side of a powerhouse who had just entered the level of Heaven’s origin creation.

The ability of teleportation caused the powerhouse who had just entered the level of Heaven’s origin creation to have no time to react.

Puff

A Sword of light from space instantly arrived above his head and slashed at him!

“Save me!”

When the powerhouse saw this terrifying attack, his expression changed drastically. He cried out for help with a terrified expression!

“Attack!”

“Damn it!”

When the rest of the Heaven’s origin manifestation powerhouses saw this scene, their expressions changed drastically!

They immediately attacked Wang Xian who had appeared.

“PFFT!”

However, the sword of light still pierced into the body of the Heaven’s origin manifestation powerhouse.

However, his body was slightly illusory, and a strange creature flew out from his body.

The creature flew to the side and turned into the figure of the expert.

He used a treasure to avoid this fatal attack!

“Defend, directly defend.”

When a control-level expert from the sword sect saw this scene, his expression changed drastically, and he immediately roared loudly!

Defense!

All-round defense.

This way, they could stop the other party’s repeated attacks and prevent them from breaking through one by one.

Although the other party could break through their defenses.

However, if they wanted to completely kill them, they would need some time!

During this time, the sword sect and the carefree sect’s support would be enough to rush over!

“Buzz Buzz Buzz!”

Buzz! Buzz! Buzz

“Don’t hold back!”

The group of experts roared loudly. At the same time, they unleashed their strongest defensive techniques and surrounded them.

When Wang Xian saw their defenses, he raised his eyebrows slightly!

His figure appeared. With a wave of his arm, an incomparably huge dragon head headed straight for them.

Boom! Boom! Boom

The sound of explosions rang out.

Their defenses began to crumble.

However, they could still withstand it!

Wang Xian continued to wave his arm and continued to attack!

“So powerful. Even when the sword sect and the Xiao Yao sect joined forces, the Seven Heaven origin creation stage powerhouses were completely suppressed. This…”

“That mysterious powerhouse’s strength is too terrifying!”

When all the powerful disciples around saw this scene, their faces were filled with shock.

This was especially so for the disciples who were in the ruler realm.

When had they ever witnessed such a scene?

He had fought against eight people from the two great sects and even suppressed them.

What level of existence was this?

“Boom Boom!”

Very soon, Wang Xian’s second attack was aimed at them.

The loud rumbling continued.

At the center, the strong practitioners from the sword sect and the carefree sect were resisting with great difficulty. Their expressions were abnormally ugly!

“The world is free and unfettered, and I am the only one who reigns supreme!”

However, at this moment, a voice was heard!

Following that, an incomparably terrifying huge boat was flying towards them at a terrifying speed!

Many huge fish were accompanying the huge boat.

The surroundings of the huge boat was a vast ocean.

When the huge fish were flying over, they leaped out of the water and attacked Wang Xian!

“Huh?”

When Wang Xian saw this scene, his eyes narrowed and he revealed a serious expression.

“Towering Dragon Horn!”

Wang Xian growled and a divine dragon horn attacked the big fish that were attacking him!

“Our sect leader is here!”

“Phew, our sect leader is here!”

The two newly advanced heaven origin creation stage powerhouses from the Xiaoyao sect who were suppressed by Wang Xian heaved a sigh of relief when they saw their sect leader rushing over.

Following that, they stared at Wang Xian coldly and gritted their teeth.

“Sect leader of the carefree sect, he is very strong. Let’s surround and attack him together.”

A control-level powerhouse from the sword sect also had a glow in his eyes as he shouted at the sect leader of the carefree sect!

“Surround him!”

The members of the carefree sect stood on the carefree boat.

Dressed in green, he stared at Wang Xian with a solemn expression in his eyes.

“Bang, Bang, Bang!”

At this moment, the towering dragon horns collided with the huge fish.

As the huge fish dissipated, the remaining power of the towering dragon horns continued to attack the carefree boat!

“Your strength is comparable to two great dao realm experts. May I know which universe are you from?”

When the carefree sect’s ancestor saw that the first collision had ended, he immediately judged Wang Xian’s strength and asked!

“Dragon King of the Dragon Palace in the nine-origin Universe!”

Wang Xian stared at the Patriarch of the Xiaoyao sect and replied indifferently!

“You have to pay the price for killing the experts of our Xiaoyao sect!”

The Patriarch of the Xiaoyao sect stared at Wang Xian coldly!

“Hehe, you guys don’t have the qualifications to make me pay the price. Your strength is inferior to mine!”

Wang Xian stared at the patriarch of the Xiaoyao sect. The divination lamp had also detected the other party’s strength.

It was comparable to the strength of two masters of the Great Dao!

This strength was not weak at all!

However, it was still lacking when compared to him!

Furthermore, even if he were to join forces with the other eight heaven origin creation stage powerhouses, they would not be able to suppress him!

At worst, Wang Xian could just escape!

“This is the territory of the Justice Alliance. It’s not something that you can be impudent about!”

The leader of the Xiaoyao sect frowned slightly and stared at him coldly.

He did not make a move rashly.

This was because he knew that with their strength, it would be very difficult for them to keep Wang Xian here!

Unless two more experts of the Great Dao level came.

“Your disciples are courting death by provoking me. I can only teach them a lesson on your behalf!”

Wang Xian was still calm!

Beside him, the lamp of divination continued to light up.

He was divining the time when the other party would make a move and whether there would be any more experts rushing over!

“Lamp of divination?”

However, at this moment, the Patriarch of the Xiaoyao sect noticed the lamp of divination floating beside Wang Xian. His gaze froze slightly!

“What is your relationship with Saint Shan Tian? Why is his lamp of divination in your hands?”

The ancestor of the Xiaoyao sect stared at Wang Xian and asked!

“I have no relationship with this Dragon King. He used some treasures to trade for my divination lamp.”

When the ancestor of the Xiaoyao sect finished his sentence.

A voice was heard from the back.

Saint Shan Tian with long hair and white beard flew over. He swept his gaze across Wang Xian and the ancestor of the Xiaoyao sect and spoke!

There was such a huge commotion over here. Even a heaven origin creator had died. Naturally, he rushed over to take a look since he was at the Great Dao of Heaven.

However, he did not expect that the main character of time was the Dragon King who had made a deal with him!

“HMM?”

The Patriarch of the Xiaoyao sect’s gaze froze when he heard his words.

“I will not interfere in your grudges!”

When Saint Shan Tian saw Wang Xian looking at him, he spoke directly and made his stance clear!
